QuestData.Title: Citizens of a New Empire
QuestData.Description: At Shek'zeer's command, the great kypari tree of Kypari Vor was twisted into a totem of horror.$B$BLike those outside of the palace, the clutch nearby is now used to corrupt our swarmborn.$B$BRecover the eggs of the Vor'thik before they are tainted. We shall raise them here. They will be the citizens of a new empire, free from the sha.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 10 Vor'thik Eggs from Kypari Vor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kypari Vor was beautiful once. Rich with amber and surrounded by prime hunting grounds.
QuestData.RewardText: They are large. They will hatch soon.$B$BGood. We may need them.
